Information: This Weather App is built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Vite for fast performance and modular development. It fetches real-time weather data from a public API and displays details like temperature, humidity, and conditions. The app also uses geolocation to detect and show weather based on the user’s current location with a clean, responsive interface.

This Face Detection Management System is developed using Python, OpenCV, and SQL. It detects and recognizes faces in real-time while managing a student database efficiently. The system stores and retrieves user data, allows searching and updating records, and integrates multiple detection methods to ensure accuracy and smooth data handling.
